import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { navActive = false; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} toggleNav() { this.navActive = !this.navActive; } }
